name: Big Bang 2.0
description:
This game was made in 48h for the Ottawa Game Jam 2017 (OJAM).

Theme: "What's done cannot be undone" - Shakespear

Goal: You have to fill the planet as much as possible
Controls: Left + Right arrow to rotate the planet, T to accelerate the rotation
Up + Down arrow to rotate the blocks, space to accelerate.

Please check out the credits !
